Author: sachiprecious

Comment: From reporter Jennifer Bendery:  Rep. Kathy Castor (D-Fla.) said Monday that a mom in her Tampa district was “ripped away” from her infant by ICE agents and unlawfully deported to Cuba.  In a letter to President Donald Trump, Castor urges him to “immediately” grant humanitarian parole for Heidy Sánchez, whose husband told Castor that ICE agents’ separation of Sanchez from her infant daughter was so traumatic that the baby was taken to the hospital.  Link to the full article: [https://www.huffpost.com/entry/kathy-castor-florida-mom-deported-cuba-trump\_n\_680fbd18e4b049bc73d5d604?utm\_medium=Social&utm\_source=reddit&utm\_campaign=us\_main](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/kathy-castor-florida-mom-deported-cuba-trump_n_680fbd18e4b049bc73d5d604?utm_medium=Social&utm_source=reddit&utm_campaign=us_main)
